name: Aziz Wimawan Kuswanputra
title: Dynamic Product owner, Business Analyst, & Quality Assurance
subtitle: Driven by curiosity and execution, I’ve led cross-border tech rollouts, QA initiatives, and product strategies while bridging business and engineering to deliver scalable solutions
bio: Versatile tech lead with 7+ years spanning QA, Product Ownership, and Business Analysis. Specialized in POS rollouts, cross-border software adaptation, and test automation. Proven track record of bridging business goals with quality-first execution—powered by process, empathy, and a borderline unhealthy obsession with system integrity.
